name: WPC Shop as a Customer for WooCommerce
author: WPClever

sections.description:
Here comes a simple plugin that brings about the greatest time-saving benefits for shop owners and store managers. This plugin offers an easy and quick switch from the administrator role to any other role without the need to request a password from users/customers. It’s a life-saving tool for shop owners to view their shop from a different role or switch between different accounts easily with just 1 click.

Logged in as a customer allows store owners to check the ordering system and optimizing the shopping experience for better performance. Stayed logged in as long as you want to double-check orders, changing as many roles as you want, and switch back in can be done within a few clicks right from the front end.

Key Features

  • Choose user roles can use this feature
  • Choose user roles that they can switch to
  • AJAX search users and login selected user

Related Features

All powerful and professional plugins for powering up your online store for free.

  • WPC Fly Cart: a powerful cart popup plugin for preview cart content.
  • WPC Share Cart: share the favorite item list in cart easily via social media or links.
  • WPC Added to Cart Notifications: display a beautiful cart notice when products are added to the cart.
  • WPC AJAX Add to Cart: for assisting AJAX Add to Cart on your site.
  • WPC Save for Later: allow customers to save items in the list when they don’t want to purchase them immediately.
sections.installation:
1. Please make sure that you installed WooCommerce
  2. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select “Add New”
  3. Search for “WPC Shop as a Customer”, Install & Activate it
  4. Go to WP-admin > WPClever > Shop as a Customer to configure
